title: BASE64 Decoder Function
description:
BASE64_DECODE_STR encoded in BASE64 text can be converted

back to plain text. With a positive edge of RUN the process starts. Here

DONE is immediately reseted, if it has been set by a previous conversion.

The BASE64 encoded text is passed on STR1, and after the conversion the

plain text is available in STR2, and DONE is set to TRUE.
name: BASE64_DECODE_STR

input.name: RUN
input.description: A boolean value that when set to TRUE by a positive edge initiates the conversion process.

input.name: STR1
input.description: The BASE64 encoded string that will be converted to plain text.

output.name: DONE
output.description: A boolean value that indicates if the conversion has been completed. It is set to TRUE once the conversion finishes.

output.name: STR2
output.description: The converted plain text output from the BASE64 encoded input string.
